contentrichtext.text: {{unreferenced|date=December 2012}} {{Infobox_Broadcast | call_letters = ZFB-TV| station_logo = [[File:ZFBTV7.png|ZFB-TV logo]]| station_slogan = | station_branding = ZFB TV 7| analog = 7 ([[Very high frequency|VHF]])| digital = | other_chs = | affiliations = [[American Broadcasting Company|ABC]]<br>[[BBC World News]] ''(secondary)''| founded = 1965| location = [[Hamilton, Bermuda]]| callsign_meaning = | former_callsigns = | owner = [[Bermuda Broadcasting|Bermuda Broadcasting Company]]| sister_stations = [[ZBM-TV]]| former_affiliations = | effective_radiated_power = | HAAT = | class = | facility_id = | homepage = | }} '''ZFB-TV''' is a television station serving [[Hamilton, Bermuda|Hamilton]] and the [[United Kingdom|British]] territory of [[Bermuda]]. It is owned by [[Bermuda Broadcasting|Bermuda Broadcasting Company]] and is an affiliate of [[United States]] [[television network]] [[American Broadcasting Company|ABC]] and the [[United Kingdom|British]] global television network [[BBC World News]]. The station broadcasts over-the-air on [[NTSC|analog]] channel 7 and is carried on channel 2 on the local cable television system. In addition, ZFB-TV also broadcasts BBC World News programming at various parts of the day, especially in late-night. ==History== '''ZFB-TV''' was founded in 1965 by Capital Broadcasting Company Ltd. Originally, the station broadcast on channel 8. In 1974, Capital Broadcasting Company merged with Bermuda Broadcasting Company and ZFB-TV was moved to channel 7. ==External links== *[http://www.bermuda-online.org/media.htm Bermuda News media] {{Bermuda TV}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Zfb-Tv}} [[Category:Television stations in Bermuda]] [[Category:ABC network affiliates]] [[Category:Television channels and stations established in 1965]] [[Category:Transnational network affiliates]] {{UK-tv-channel-stub}}
